TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit AspNetWebSocket extends System.Net.WebSockets.WebSocket
Public NotInheritable Class AspNetWebSocket Inherits WebSocket
public ref class AspNetWebSocket sealed : System::Net::WebSockets::WebSocket

summary.span: 表示实施全双工连接（在 Web 服务器和 ASP.NET 应用程序中的客户端之间）。

span.span: Represents a real-time full-duplex connection between a web server and a client in an ASP.NET application.

summary.span: 取消 对象中的任何挂起的 I/O 操作，并设置该对象的状态，以便它不能用于启动其他的 I/O 操作。

span.span: Cancels any pending I/O operations on the object and sets the state of the object so that it cannot be used to start additional I/O operations.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 调用方法后，仍然可以访问不涉及 i/o 操作的属性和方法。After the method has been called, you can still access properties and methods that do not involve I/O operations.

span.span: The object was previously disposed.

MemberSignature.Value: public override System.Threading.Tasks.Task CloseAsync (System.Net.WebSockets.WebSocketCloseStatus closeStatus, string statusDescription, System.Threading.CancellationToken cancellationToken);

.method public hidebysig virtual instance class System.Threading.Tasks.Task CloseAsync(valuetype System.Net.WebSockets.WebSocketCloseStatus closeStatus, string statusDescription, valuetype System.Threading.CancellationToken cancellationToken) cil managed
Public Overrides Function CloseAsync (closeStatus As WebSocketCloseStatus, statusDescription As String, cancellationToken As CancellationToken) As Task

public: override System::Threading::Tasks::Task ^ CloseAsync(System::Net::WebSockets::WebSocketCloseStatus closeStatus, System::String ^ statusDescription, System::Threading::CancellationToken cancellationToken);
override this.CloseAsync : System.Net.WebSockets.WebSocketCloseStatus * string * System.Threading.CancellationToken -> System.Threading.Tasks.Task

span.span: The status code of the close operation.
The status message of the close operation.
The object that cancels a pending operation.

summary.span: 发送异步消息给客户以关闭连接。

span.span: Sends an asynchronous message to a client to close the connection.

summary.span: 如果服务器初始化关闭连接请求，则该方法在返回前会一直等待客户端的通知。

span.span: If the server initiates the request to close the connection, the method waits for the client to acknowledge the request before it returns.
A reference to the operation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 你可以对 客户端启动的请求和服务器启动的请求使用和方法来关闭 连接。You can use the and methods for both client-initiated and server-initiated requests to close an connection. 这两种方法以同样的方式处理客户端启动的请求：客户端向服务器发送一条消息以关闭连接后，服务器将调用这些方法之一并向客户端发送确认，然后该方法将返回。The two methods handle client-initiated requests in the same way: After the client sends a message to the server to close the connection, the server calls one of these methods and sends an acknowledgment to the client, and then the method returns. 对于服务器启动的请求，这两种方法的工作方式有所不同。For server-initiated requests, the two methods work differently. 方法将消息发送到客户端以关闭连接，等待响应，然后返回。The method sends a message to the client to close the connection, waits for a response, and then returns. 服务器不等待客户端发送的任何其他数据。The server does not wait for any additional data sent by the client. 与此相反， 方法会向客户端发送一条消息，以便关闭连接并返回而不等待响应。In contrast, the method sends a message to the client to close the connection and returns without waiting for a response. 方法返回后，可以调用 方法，并处理客户端发送的其他数据或确认。After the method returns, you can call the method and handle either additional data or the acknowledgment that the client sends.

span.span: The object was previously disposed.
The object is in an aborted state.
-or-
Sending operations are unavailable.
-or-
Receiving operations are unavailable.

span.span: Sends an asynchronous message to a client to close the connection.

summary.span: 若服务器初始化了关闭连接请求，则该方法不会等待响应，直接返回。

span.span: If the server initiates the request to close the connection, the method returns without waiting for a response.
A reference to the operation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 你可以对 客户端启动的请求和服务器启动的请求使用和方法来关闭 连接。You can use the and methods for both client-initiated and server-initiated requests to close an connection. 这两种方法以同样的方式处理客户端启动的请求：客户端向服务器发送一条消息以关闭连接后，服务器将调用这些方法之一并向客户端发送确认，然后该方法将返回。The two methods handle client-initiated requests in the same way: After the client sends a message to the server to close the connection, the server calls one of these methods and sends an acknowledgment to the client, and then the method returns. 对于服务器启动的请求，这两种方法的工作方式有所不同。For server-initiated requests, the two methods work differently. 方法将消息发送到客户端以关闭连接，等待响应，然后返回。The method sends a message to the client to close the connection, waits for a response, and then returns. 服务器不等待客户端发送的任何其他数据。The server does not wait for any additional data sent by the client. 与此相反， 方法会向客户端发送一条消息，以便关闭连接并返回而不等待响应。In contrast, the method sends a message to the client to close the connection and returns without waiting for a response. 方法返回后，可以调用 方法，并处理客户端发送的其他数据或确认。After the method returns, you can call the method and handle either additional data or the acknowledgment that the client sends.

summary.span: 释放 对象使用的所有资源。

span.span: Releases all resources used by an object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks ASP.NET 自动对 对象调用方法 ，以释放在代码执行完毕后保留的任何资源。ASP.NET automatically calls the method on a object to release any resources that remain after your code has finished executing.
